entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Ingonish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ingonish Beach 10:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: N 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High plus 3 except minus 1 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Periods of rain except freezing rain over higher terrain. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3 except minus 1 over the Highlands. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning except plus 1 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of freezing rain over the Highlands. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning except plus 1 over the Highlands. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
